gear.name: fsl-fslreorient2std
gear.label: FSL: fslreorient2std - Reorient Image to Standard Template
gear.description: fslreorient2std is a tool for reorienting the image to match the approximate orientation of the standard template images (MNI152). It only applies 0, 90, 180 or 270 degree rotations. It is not a registration tool. It requires NIfTI images with valid orientation information in them (seen by valid labels in FSLView).  This tool assumes the labels are correct - if not, fix that before using this Gear.
gear.author: Analysis Group, FMRIB, Oxford, UK.

output_name.description: Name to be used for the output NIfTI file. OPTIONAL: By default the gear will use <inputfile>_std.nii.gz.

invocation-schema.title: Invocation manifest for FSL: fslreorient2std - Reorient Image to Standard Template
